item.title: Disaster on the Farm! Steering Wheel Snaps
item.description: A simple job became an emergency! This video documents the shocking moment our steering wheel snapped mid-job and the urgent, challenging repair required to keep the farm running

media:content.media:title: Disaster on the Farm! Steering Wheel Snaps
media:content.media:description: A simple job became an emergency! This video documents the shocking moment our steering wheel snapped mid-job and the urgent, challenging repair required to keep the farm running

item.title: A Chain of Issues! This Is Why We Don’t Plow Anymore
item.description: Go inside a challenging day in the field. We'll show you the major equipment breakdowns and the cascading problems that explain exactly why we decided to change our farming methods forever.

item.title: We Have Been Humbled! Lesson Learned!
item.description: What happens when a project humbles you? This video documents a major setback that taught us a valuable, unforgettable lesson. We’ll share the entire story and the wisdom we gained from the experience.

item.title: The Soybean Aphids Are Out Of Control!
item.description: What happens when soybean aphids get out of control? This video is a first-hand look at a critical situation, detailing the necessary steps for pest management and saving the harvest.

item.title: Working The Last Field To End In A Downpour!
item.description: What happens when the last job is hit by a sudden rainstorm? This video documents our race against the weather to finish the final field before the downpour makes the work impossible.

item.title: It’s Seen Better Days!!
item.description: The job is big, but we can do it.

item.title: This Is Going To Be A Disaster! Killing Beans!
item.description: What happens when a necessary job feels like a disaster? We’ll show you the full process of killing the bean plants and explain why this critical step is essential for a smooth and successful harvest.

item.title: The Gophers Are Destroying Our Tile System!!
item.description: What happens when gophers compromise your farm's drainage? This video documents the frustrating damage to our tile system and the urgent, costly repairs needed to prevent massive water damage.

item.title: Never A Good Day When The Hitch Breaks Off!
item.description: Never a good day when the hitch breaks! We’ll show you the major setback that stopped our work cold, detailing the costly damage and the challenge of getting the heavy machinery moving again.

item.title: What Are We Waiting For?
item.description: The waiting game is over! This video captures the suspenseful moment before a major event, showing the final preparations before we jump into the big challenge or exciting reveal.

item.title: Busting Out Old Iron To Fight Mother Nature!
item.description: When a job gets tough, you bring in the vintage equipment. This video documents our fight against challenging conditions, showing the sheer power of old iron getting the job done.

item.title: We've Got A Problem! The John Deere 9750 STS Got Stuck
item.description: What happens when your combine gets stuck? This is a first-hand look at the difficult recovery of the 9750 STS and the technical steps required to get the massive machine out of the field.

item.title: Pulling A Tractor Out Of A Snowy Situation ❄️
item.description: A difficult challenge on a cold day! This video documents a tractor rescue mission, showing the techniques and equipment we used to pull a heavy machine out of a tricky, snowy situation.

item.title: We Have Been Humbled! Lesson Learned!
item.description: What happens when a project humbles you? This video documents a major setback that taught us a valuable, unforgettable lesson. We’ll share the entire story and the wisdom we gained from the experience.

item.title: The Soybean Aphids Are Out Of Control
item.description: A major pest infestation is threatening the soybean crop. This video documents our urgent efforts to control the soybean aphids and the steps we are taking to minimize potential crop loss.

item.title: Harvest Preparation! 3 Tarps in 4 Hours!
item.description: The secret to a smooth harvest is in the prep work. This video breaks down the full process of installing new tarps on our grain trailers and getting everything ready for the busy season.

item.title: What Happened to My Combine?
item.description: A serious problem stopped our harvest cold. This video documents the complex diagnostic process to find out what happened to our combine and how we managed to get it running again.

item.title: The Grain Pits Are Flooding!!
item.description: What happens when the grain pit floods? This video is a first-hand look at a critical situation, detailing the necessary steps to pump out the water and minimize the loss to the stored grain.

item.title: Will We Fall In Love With The Green Machine??
item.description: Go inside the cab for the honest review. We’ll show you the pros and cons of the new green machine and whether we’ve fallen in love with its performance and features.

item.title: Stuck Deep in the Mud! How Do I Get Out of Here?
item.description: We faced a serious problem in the field. This video documents the story of how a vehicle got stuck deep in the mud and the difficult process of getting it out.
